code: import React from"react";import'./intro.css';import btnImg from'../../assets/suitcase-icon.png';import{Link}from"react-scroll";import bg from"../../assets/background-headshot.png";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Intro=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"intro",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"introContent",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"hello",children:"Hello,"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"introText",children:["I'm ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"introName",children:"Emmanuel"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"Software Engineer "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"introPara",children:["I am a skilled full stack software developer with ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})," experience in creating visually appealing and ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})," user friendly websites."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"btn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:btnImg,alt:"Hire me",className:"btnImg"}),"Hire Me"]})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:bg,alt:"profile",className:"bg"})]});};export default Intro;
